occupation: Field Sales Director - Public Sector at SecurityScorecard
headline: Field Sales Director - Public Sector
summary:
SecurityScorecard is the global leader in cybersecurity ratings & threat intelligence, helping thousands of organizations of all types and sizes gain instant visibility into their own security posture and that of their third parties. I joined the Public Sector Team in June 2022 as a Field Sales Director focused on clients from Virginia to New York in the SLED space, assumed Federal responsibilities in October 2022 and then Canada in May 2023. Starting 2024, I am responsible for Federal Civilian, DOD, & Systems Integrators; Canadian Public Sector; and SLED customers in DC, VA, MD, and Delaware. 

In May 2021, I joined Presidio Federal as an Account Manager covering several Civilian agencies. Presidio Federal empowers clients with solutions in Digital Infrastructure, IT Modernization, Wireless, Collaboration, Cloud, Cybersecurity, Automation and Critical Infrastructure, having earned clients' trust through solid delivery and support. Presidio Federal provides continued support through managed and professional services to guarantee long-term success. 

In February 2019, I joined Merlin Cyber to support their Public Sector business, delivering cybersecurity solutions that government organizations need to protect critical assets while conducting their mission. My accomplishments at Merlin included doubling our partner's (Darktrace) federal revenue and growing pipeline by more than 20X in 2020, as well as earning three promotions in 25 months.

Starting in February 2013, I worked for five years at Carahsoft Technology Corporation, progressing from business development positions to become a sales manager for software distribution activity for manufacturer partners. Following Carahsoft, I joined Apcela for a year to help Enterprise customers with high-performance network and application delivery solutions for real-time, mission-critical and geographically distributed applications and data sources. 

Prior to starting my professional career, I graduated from Virginia Tech in December 2012 after three and a half years, with a Bachelor of Arts in History and Minor in Business.

experiences.title: Field Sales Director - Public Sector
experiences.description:
SecurityScorecard provides cyber risk intelligence solutions to support Third-Party Risk Management & Supply Chain Risk Management Programs, Financial Regulators, Structured Oversight Programs, and Threat Intelligence Teams to monitor organizations for cybersecurity risk & compliance. The company operates a global network of sensors, scanners, malware sinkholes, honeypots, and dark web crawlers to surface threats & security exposure on the attack surfaces of over twelve (12) million organizations worldwide. In addition to the evidence-based risk ratings, SecurityScorecard surfaces vulnerability and threat intelligence data to be consumed via UI and API into existing security stacks.

Responsible for selling cyber risk, threat intelligence, and services solutions to the Public Sector Community in the United States & Canada. 

FY2023 Results:
- Onboarded Five (5) Net New Logos in SLED
- Onboarded Four (4) Net New Logos in U.S. & Canadian Federal
- TSA Surface Operations – Five (5) Year Contract
- Largest Deal in SecurityScorecard history with the Canadian Centre for Cyber Security (CCCS)
- 233% New ARR Quota Attainment; 237% Services (NRR) Quota Attainment
- 132 Opportunities Created, Totaling $7.59M in Pipeline
- Achieved President’s Club for 2023 Performance

FY 2022 Results: 
- Onboarded Two (2) Net New Logos in SLED
- 52% New ARR Quota Attainment; 46% Services (NRR) Quota Attainment
- 111 Opportunities Created, Totaling $3.16M in Pipeline

experiences.title: Federal Account Manager
experiences.description:
Presidio Federal provides the US Government with strategic solutions to enhance mission success and achieve positive business outcomes.  At Presidio Federal, mission success is everything - we apply technology as a means to that end.  With decades of technology experience and an extensive collaborative partner network, Presidio Federal empowers our clients with solutions in Digital Infrastructure, IT modernization, Wireless, Collaboration, Cloud, Cybersecurity, Automation and Critical Infrastructure. We have earned our clients' trust through solid delivery and support.  Our professional services are delivered collaboratively to assist the workforce transformation and professional growth of our clients' IT staff, and we provide continued support through managed services to guarantee long-term success.

Key Technology Partnerships: AWS (Premier) | Cisco (Gold) | Dell (Titanium) | HPE (Platinum) | IBM (Premier) | Microsoft (Gold) | Palo Alto Networks (Diamond) | VMWare (Premier)

Responsible for the following agencies:
- Indian Health Service (IHS)
- Department of Agriculture (USDA)
- Treasury (BEP, BFS, Mint, OCC) and other Federal Financial agencies (SEC, FDIC, EXIM)
- Office of Personnel Management (OPM), General Services Administration (GSA), Government Accountability Office (GAO)
- Housing & Urban Development (HUD)
- Pension Benefit Guarantee Corp

experiences.title: Federal Account Executive
experiences.description:
Account Executive for Merlin's cybersecurity solutions portfolio into the Department of Transportation, Department of Agriculture, and Department of Education. Attained 107% of Quota for Q1 2021.

Merlin International offers a broad portfolio of solutions that secure the enterprise from endpoints to networks, from governance to risk management, and from infrastructure to information. Combining solutions with industry expertise and experience, Merlin delivers the cybersecurity solutions that organizations need to protect their most mission-critical business assets.

experiences.title: Product Specialist - Darktrace (Cyber AI/Threat Defense)
experiences.description:
Darktrace is a Merlin Portfolio Partner, a world-leading cyber AI company, and the creator of Autonomous Response. Darktrace’s Cyber AI/ML Platform monitors the entire digital environment of an enterprise to pinpoint threats and autonomously respond to malicious actors in real time at machine speed. While rule and signature-based solutions offer some protection against pre-identified threats, the reality is that attacks consistently evade these and get inside your network. 

This is a Federal sales position responsible for managing Darktrace opportunities across the Federal Government and Systems Integrator territory. 
- Managed the Darktrace pipeline directly with customers and partners. Collaborated with Merlin’s team of Territory Account Executives to target federal agencies and programs for market penetration and expansion.
- Prospected, uncovered, and managed opportunities in federal accounts not covered by Account Executives.
- Grew Darktrace pipeline from $350K in February 2020 to $5.5M total pipeline with $2.4M in qualified opportunities in December 2020, including five active proof of values within targeted expansion accounts and net new accounts.
- Doubled Darktrace Federal business by adding two net new agency logos in 2020, bringing total federal customers to four and agency logos to three.

experiences.title: Cybersecurity Solutions Representative - Public Sector
experiences.description:
Was responsible for Account Management and Business Development in support of Merlin International's next-generation cybersecurity solutions that protect sensitive government data and IT assets.
- Created, built, and prospected government executives and end users to build pipeline for software vendor partners by leveraging contact databases, attending trade shows, and monitoring contract vehicles.
- Possessed Federal procurement cycle and executed contracts through federal contract vehicles, including GSA IT Schedule 70, SEWP V, NIH CIO-CS, and DHS First Source II contracts.
- Responsible for managing Homeland Security, Health and Human Services, and various Independent Agencies while supporting a team of account executives across the entire federal territory.
- Represented and provided marketing for software vendors, to include: Okta, Netskope, CyberArk, 1E Technologies, ForeScout, Sepio Systems, Darktrace, Swimlane, and Wickr.

experiences.title: Solutions Consultant
experiences.description:
Responsible for Account Management and Business Development for a Leader in Value-added Services for Networking and Application Delivery. Apcela designs solutions to eliminate the network as a barrier to business success in the cloud for the enterprise, providing customized WAN solutions to support hybrid IT and real time compute initiatives for enterprises and trading firms.
- Managed a prospect pipeline for lead generation and qualification.
- Managed opportunities from lead qualification to close with Enterprise customers, from small-to-medium business (SMB) clients up to Fortune 500 clients.
- Managed Apcela’s Capital Market accounts (50+) in order to minimize client churn and revenue loss by managing upsell through platform upgrade and renewal opportunities.

experiences.title: Sales Team Lead
experiences.description:
Managed the Distribution Team for Enterprise Mobility Management, Collaboration, and Productivity Solutions for a Top-Ranked GSA Schedule Contract Holder and trusted software Master Aggregator.
- Drove software sales and managed sales opportunities through a variety of Federal Contracts including, but not limited to, the GSA, SEWP, First Source II and NETCENTS vehicles on behalf of software vendor partners.
- Responsible for channel management through coordination of reseller, services, and integrator partnerships.
- Managed distribution activities across Public and Private Sector industry verticals in the US and Canada for the Mobility Team’s main software partner, BlackBerry Software.
- Responsible for overseeing lead generation and qualification activities; coordinating marketing activity; operational management supporting technology vendor partners; and new vendor on-boarding.
- Managed distribution and reseller activities for an additional eight technology vendors.
- Achieved 2017 Revenue Goal for the Mobility Team in November, eventually achieving overall growth of 22% YoY against a goal of 15% YoY growth.
- Lead Generation and Marketing Activity in 2017 created over 50 Opportunities and $5 million in new pipeline.

experiences.title: Senior Account Manager
experiences.description:
Account Manager for Enterprise Mobility Management solutions for Civilian Agencies, State and Local government, Education, and Commercial customers; Account Manager for Project Management, Requirements Tracking, and Collaborative software solutions for Federal and State agencies as a member of the Intelligence and Innovative Solutions Team.

Responsible for proactive lead generation and qualification; solution environment requirements; understanding of government requirements and procurement cycles; government contracts (state and Federal); quote and order management for technology vendors and channel partners.

experiences.title: Account Manager
experiences.description: Federal Civilian, SLED, and Commercial SMB accounts.
